sourcing.instructions:
- Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online at a specialized rare earth metals retailer. 
 - Silicon: Obtain from an electronics or materials supplier, typically in powder form. 
 - Samarium: Available from rare earth metal suppliers or online marketplaces. 
 - Technetium: Acquire from a nuclear materials supplier or specialized chemical vendor. Note: Handle with care due to radioactivity.
